summary: Exploring the intersection of ecosystems, design, and technology, this collection features insightful articles and profiles. Dive into the concept of 'ecosystem architecture' and meet leaders like Jan Hein Hoogstad, also known as 'yeehaa,' whose pioneering work spans UX, tech, and design. This overview captures the essence of dynamic, non-hierarchical networks and innovative organizational design.
excerpt: Ecosystems traditionally bound to specific geographic areas now metaphorically describe dynamic non-hierarchical networks in business and technology urging new practices like 'ecosystem architecture'
